description: Multi-agent session to review, clean up, organize, and ensure UDS standards compliance for all documentation across the coderef ecosystem. Will use Assistant as orchestrator coordinating 7 project agents (coderef-workflow, coderef-docs, coderef-context, coderef-dashboard, coderef-testing, papertrail, coderef-personas) to audit and update their documentation to meet new Papertrail UDS standards.

scope.audit: Identify all documentation files (foundation, system, workorder docs)
scope.organize: Create consistent structure across all projects
scope.validate: Ensure all docs meet Papertrail UDS standards (score >= 90)

session_phases: Phase 1: Inventory - Each agent audits their documentation
Phase 2: Gap Analysis - Identify UDS compliance gaps
Phase 3: Implementation - Clean up, organize, validate to UDS standards
